description:
Overwatch 2 is an always-on and ever-evolving free-to-play, team-based action game set in an optimistic future, where every match is the ultimate 5v5 battlefield brawl featuring new heroes and maps, different ways to play, and unique cosmetics! Lead the charge, ambush your enemies, or aid your allies as one of Overwatch’s 35+ distinct heroes. Team up with friends, take them into battle across 25+ futuristic maps inspired by real-world locations, and master multiple unique game modes.

Overwatch 2 – Season 8: Call of the Hunt

Introducing Mauga, a powerful Samoan warrior who comes with a rapid-fire personality, massive stature, and brawl-centric abilities. Use his two chain guns to light up the competition while taking the fight to his opponents with his powerful tank abilities.

But that’s not all – check out the other season features:

Conqueror powerful foes in Battle of the Beasts, where you go head-to-head with the powerful Grand Beast Orisa in a unique 4v4 brawl. Support your Grand Beast as they fight against the opponents’ Beast, and then give your Beast a health boost by capturing energy pylons before your opponents do!

Winter Wonderland returns with a crisp new way to earn rewards! Play through returning seasonal favorites like Yeti Hunter and Mei Snowball Offensive and earn tickets towards the new Winter Fair Event Pass! Use tickets to choose your own Winter Fair rewards and freeze the competition with your stunning new looks!

Later this year, we’re also bringing all new Hero Mastery courses for new heroes and Year of the Dragon, our Lunar New Year seasonal event!
name: Overwatch® 2
intro:
OVERWATCH 2, A FUTURE WORTH FIGHTING FOR! 
Overwatch 2 is an always-on and ever-evolving free-to-play, team-based action game set in an optimistic future.
